item.title: About
item.author: margaux.bregere@gmail.com (Margaux Brégère)
item.description: I am associate professor (PAST) in the Laboratoire de Probabilités, Statistique et Modélisation (LPSM) at Sorbonne Université and a research engineer at EDF Lab Paris Saclay in the Optimization SImulation RIsks and Statistics (OSIRIS) department.
